data.title: IT Support for Cape Town and Johannesburg
data.meta_description: Elevate your business with Techtron's specialized IT support in Cape Town and Johannesburg. Trust our tailored, high-quality IT solutions.
data.text:
Lets Connect Fully Managed IT.

A weight off your shoulders. Efficient and cost effective. Let us look after everything to do with your IT – Management, security, compliance, support... All at a fixed monthly fee.

We specialise in professional service companies such as Engineering firms with 20+ employees Co-managed IT.

We’ve got your back.

If you already have an in-house IT team or person, we will give your team the support and additional skills and tools they need to keep your business secure and optimised for a fixed monthly fee.

Perfect for companies with 80+ employees. Lets Connect Back up your data.

Regret nothing!

Avoid tears, downtime and financial losses. We offer an inexpensive data protection, backup and recovery solution that is reliable and simple.

Includes 2TB of Cloud Data with every server backup. Lets Connect

Let us manage your IT. You focus on your business.

TECHTRON can support your business perfectly. We can look after your IT infrastructure, security, data and compliance. We are based in Johannesburg and Cape Town and provide managed IT services and support to companies like yours.

Fully Managed IT

We offer efficient and cost-effective outsourced IT services for small to medium businesses. We combine expert management, security, compliance and support for a fixed monthly fee. Read more

Co-managed IT

If you already have an in-house IT team or person, we can support you with our valuable services and know-how. We can keep your business secure and optimised for a fixed monthly fee. Read more

Backup Services

Avoid tears, downtime and financial losses. Our inexpensive data protection, off-site backup and recovery solution is reliable and simple. Protect your critical data before it becomes a problem when it's lost or compromised. Read more

Security

TECHTRON’S active threat monitoring service proactively monitors your network and notifies us of any issues. For peace of mind, let us manage any cyber threats and security issues. Read more

Remote Support

Keep your business IT optimised at all times. With just one click of a button, our remote support will be there to help you. The monthly fee is cost-effective and comprehensive.

Firewall Services

Our TECHTRON firewall service is designed around flexibility, scalability and trust. Let us monitor and control your network traffic and put effective security rules in place. Protection is key to continuity. Read more

Microsoft Office 365

Install Microsoft Office throughout your business. Access files anywhere, both on or offline. Improve your online security with regular security and software updates. Read more

Microsoft Azure

The Azure cloud platform is designed to make your life easier. You can manage applications across multiple clouds using the tools of your choice.

Monitoring

Let us keep our expert eye on things. Our team can monitor your servers, workstations and network and keep your anti-virus software and windows patch management up to date.

Hosting

TECHTRON offers a range of hosted service solutions ranging from dedicated physical servers to a fully managed virtual server environment. Let one of our solution aarchitects create the perfect hosting for you.

Included in all monthly contracts

24/7 SOC Monitoring

Expert Advice

Reporting

Qualified Helpdesk
